fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.store.javamail.mbox

Class MboxReader

  • Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.lib.store.javamail.mbox.MboxReader

  • public class MboxReader
extends Object
    Optimized buffered mbox file reader for Thunderbird mbox file.

    Warning:Only for reading and without file locking or new messages management.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MboxReader(java.util.logging.Logger logger, byte[] source)
      Instantiates a new thunder mbox byte reader.
      MboxReader(java.util.logging.Logger logger, java.io.File file)
      Instantiates a new thunder mbox file reader.

    • Method Detail

      • getLogger

        public java.util.logging.Logger getLogger()
        Gets the logger created during the store extractor construction, and used in all mailextract classes.

        For convenience each class which may have some log actions has it's own getLogger method always returning the store extractor logger.

        Returns:
        logger
